com.deezer.sdk.network.connect

Class SessionStore

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.deezer.sdk.network.connect.SessionStore

  • public class SessionStore
extends java.lang.Object
    Allows to store and retrieve OAuth credentials for :
    • sharing the credentials between activities in a single app ;
    • sharing credentials between successive launches of the app in order to prevent user to have to relog. This services uses the shared preferences to store and retrive values.
    Author:
    Deezer

    • Method Detail

      • save

        public boolean save(DeezerConnect session,
           android.content.Context context)
        Saves the session credentials in the shared preferences so that they are accessible by future activities.
        Parameters:
        session - the deezerConnect object containing the credentials.
        context - the application using this service.
        Returns:
        a boolean indicating wether or not the save operation succeeded.

      • restore

        public boolean restore(DeezerConnect session,
              android.content.Context context)
        Restores the session credentials previously stored.
        Parameters:
        session - the deezerConnect object containing the credentials. It will be filled with previously obtained credentials if operation succeeds.
        context - the application using this service.
        Returns:
        a boolean indicating wether or not the save restore succeeded.

      • clear

        public boolean clear(android.content.Context context)
        Clear the session credentials previously stored.
        Parameters:
        context - the application using this service.
        Returns:
        a boolean indicating wether or not the save clear succeeded.
